modName: Hunting in Skyrim - No Perks - Skyre patch
summary: This patch will allow Hunting in skyrim No perks version to use SkyRE perks and therefore player will be able to update HIS perks as intended.
descriptionHtml:
This patch is for Hunting in Skyrim (HIS) mod no perks version ONLY and Skyrim Redone. 


WARNING: with HIS version 1.3.7 this patch will no longer be necessary as author will
probably implement these changes. 


What this patch does:
1)     Uses SkyRE Focus level 1 perk instead of vanilla overdraw perk so that HIS mod can update
        Hunter’s Strike perk.

2)     Uses SkyRE Focus level 3 perk instead of vanilla Hunter’s Discipline so that HIS can
        update Hunter’s Discipline rank 2 perk.

3)     Uses SkyRE Focus level 5 perk instead of vanilla Hunter’s Discipline so that HIS can
        update Vampire Hunter perk. 

Load order:
Must be placed below Hunting in Skyrim – No Perks.esp



Credits to

B1gBadDaddy for creating Hunting in Skyrim

T3nd0 for creating T3nd0s Skyrim Redone

Bethesda for creating Skyrim and giving us the tools to mod it so easily.

Nexus for hosting the mod and supporting the community.
author: macrads
